headline: Henry Schein Chairman and CEO Stanley M. Bergman Receives National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors Dirk Van Dongen Lifetime Achievement Award
summary: MELVILLE, N.Y., February 12, 2025--Henry Schein, Inc. (Nasdaq: HSIC) announced today that Stanley M. Bergman, Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer, received the National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors (NAW) Dirk Van Dongen Lifetime Achievement Award.

content.title: Henry Schein Chairman and CEO Stanley M. Bergman Receives National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors Dirk Van Dongen Lifetime Achievement Award
content.summary: MELVILLE, N.Y., February 12, 2025--Henry Schein, Inc. (Nasdaq: HSIC) announced today that Stanley M. Bergman, Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer, received the National Association of Wholesaler-Distributors (NAW) Dirk Van Dongen Lifetime Achievement Award.

thumbnail.caption: Left to right: Stanley Bergman, Kathy Mazzarella (Vice-Chair of NAW Board of Directors and Chairman, President, and CEO of Graybar), and Eric Hoplin (President and CEO, NAW). (Photo: Business Wire)
